```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}

tesseract::tesseract_download("por")

por <- tesseract::tesseract("por")

files <- list.files(
  path = "data/minutes_files/",
  recursive =
    TRUE,
  full.names = TRUE,
  pattern = glue::glue(".pdf$")
)


df_jpg <- tibble::as_tibble(files) %>% 
  dplyr::rename("doc_id" = value) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(100:110) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(text = cat(tesseract::ocr(doc_id, engine = por)))

text <- tesseract::ocr("http://jeroen.github.io/images/testocr.png", engine = eng)
cat(text)
```
